keywords.cdata: Borrower, disbursements, expansion, LOAN, pension, pension reforms, procurement, Social Protection, Technical Assistance, young children

project_abstract.cdata: The objectives of the Additional financing for the Scaling-up of the Social Protection Technical Assistance Project are to support the efforts of the Government of Chile to implement Chile Solidario and lay the basis for a national system of social protection now including a subsystem for young children. The closing date for the project will be extended from August 31, 2011 until December 31, 2012. The extension is necessary to allow the Government of Chile sufficient time to complete disbursements under the loan. Utilization of the resources of the additional financing has been delayed due to the change of Government, the major role that the executing agency (Ministry of Planning) had in responding to the emergency related to the earthquake early last year, as well as initial unfamiliarity with the Bank and its procedures. The ownership of the Government has been demonstrated by their preparation of an action plan to fully utilize the additional financing loan resources by the end of 2012. This will be the first extension of the additional financing loan.

P082037.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ES</LangCode><ProjectName>Chile: proyecto de asistencia técnica para la protección social </ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>Los objetivos de desarrollo del proyecto original apuntan a respaldar las iniciativas del Gobierno para ejecutar el programa Chile Solidario y para sentar las bases de un sistema nacional de protección social. Serían los mismos en el caso del financiamiento adicional. Este documento apunta a reflejar el carácter étnico de las medidas del programa de trabajo incluidas en el financiamiento adicional del Proyecto de Asistencia Técnica Sistema de Protección Social de Chile. No se anticipan efectos negativos sobre las poblaciones indígenas a raíz de la ejecución de la iniciativa Chile Crece Contigo ni de las actividades adicionales relacionadas con la iniciativa Chile Solidario. En el caso de Chile Crece Contigo, el Gobierno se esforzó sustancialmente para garantizar que las actividades respondan a valores culturales.</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
